name: muse
label: Realism
description: Armor Reduced. Attack Increased. Archers Reload Slower. More Experience Levels. Can Plant Fruit Trees, Wood Trees and Roads. More Loot. Units Cost Less Wood, Structures Cost More. No Tower and Outpost Restrictions. Agility and Strength Stats. Heroes are just Experienced Soldiers. Fish Farms. City Building Features(auras). Spikes can be built in own territory. Fine Motor Skills(Makes Females more interesting support class).
